title: Celebrating H.L. Davis, Oregon's Only Winner of the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction
teaser: H.L. Davis is the only Oregon author to win a Pulitzer Prize for fiction. Eighty years after Honey in the Horn was first published, it’s being reissued...
contentencoded:
H.L. Davis is the only Oregon author to win a Pulitzer Prize for fiction. Eighty years after Honey in the Horn was first published, it’s being reissued by OSU Press. Eric Alan speaks with historian Dick Etulain, who wrote the book’s introduction, about the significance of the author and book. There will be a book release event at Umpqua Valley Arts Center in Roseburg on Wednesday evening, June 10th.Interview with Dick Etulain about H.L. Davis, Honey in the Horn
